MinIO.description:
MinIO is an S3-compatible object storage server.

Based on a custom docker image, available for amd64 and arm64 architecture.

After installation, In order to access the built-in MinIO Admin Portal visit http://ROCKSTOR_IP:9001.
MinIO.more_info: This Rock-on uses a custom MinIO Docker image to implement a single MinIO instance with a single object storage share, suitable for use on a private network. If your connections traverse a network you do not control, consider using a VPN for encryption.

/data.description: Choose a share for MinIO object storage
/data.label: Object Storage [e.g. minio-obj-store]

MINIO_ROOT_USER.description: MinIO Administrator Username [3 to 128 alphanumeric characters]
MINIO_ROOT_USER.label: Admin User [e.g. admin]
